code: import React from"react";import PopUpWithForm from"./PopUpWithForm";import UserContext from"./UserContext";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function EditProfile(_ref){let{handleClose,open,onUpdateUser}=_ref;const[name,setName]=React.useState("");const[description,setDescription]=React.useState("");const currentUser=React.useContext(UserContext);React.useEffect(()=>{setName(currentUser.name);setDescription(currentUser.about);},[currentUser]);function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();onUpdateUser({name,about:description});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PopUpWithForm,{title:"Editar Perfil",handleClose:handleClose,classId:"popup_container-profile",open:open,onSubmit:handleSubmit,buttonTitle:"Guardar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Nombre",className:"popup__input popup__input_name",required:true,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),minLength:"2",maxLength:"40",name:"name",defaultValue:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"popup__error popup__error_type_name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Acerca de mi",className:"popup__input popup__input_about",defaultValue:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true,minLength:"2",maxLength:"200",name:"about"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"popup__error popup__error_type_about"})]})});}
